course_name: Professional Certificate Program in Data Science and AI
description: This program is designed for individuals seeking to master Data Analysis, Statistical Modeling, and Machine Learning, covering essential tools and methods from data wrangling with Excel and SQL to Advanced Machine Learning and Neural Networks.
eligibility: Passion for Digital Marketing & a desire to learn, with basic English communication.

projects.title: Superstore Sales Project
projects.description: Analyze superstore sales data using Excel to generate insights.

projects.title: RSVP Case Study
projects.description: Analyze movie data using MySQL to provide insights and recommendations for RSVP Movies.

projects.title: Credit Risk Analysis
projects.description: Analyze loan application data using EDA in Python to identify factors influencing loan default risk.

projects.title: IPL Visualisation Project
projects.description: Build a Tableau dashboard of IPL statistics over the years to create an infographic.

projects.title: Bike Sharing Demand Prediction
projects.description: Build a regression model to predict the demand for shared bikes for BoomBikes.

projects.title: Lead Scoring Classification
projects.description: Build a logistic regression model to assign lead scores and identify potential leads for X Education.

modules.description: Learn the CRISP-DM framework, logical thinking, and translating business objectives into data requirements.
Learn IF statements, nested IFs, descriptive statistics, charts, dashboard creation, Pivot tables, VLOOKUP, and HLOOKUP.
Introduction to SQL, database structure, ERD, data modeling, and hands-on database creation in MySQL Workbench.
Learn DDL & DML statements, aggregate functions, ordering results, and using the HAVING clause.
Learn joins, set operations, views, string and date-time functions, regular expressions, nested queries, and window functions.
Overview of Python, IDE setup (Jupyter), basic syntax, variables, expressions, and data types (lists, tuples, dictionaries, sets).

modules.module_title: Functional Programming and OOP in Python
modules.description: Covering functions, lambda, map, filter, reduce, file handling, exception handling, and core OOP concepts like classes, objects, inheritance, and polymorphism.

modules.module_title: Data Manipulation with Numpy and Pandas
modules.description: Introduction to Numpy for numerical operations and Pandas for data manipulation, covering arrays, DataFrames, filtering, sorting, grouping, and handling missing data.
Learn data visualization with Matplotlib and Seaborn, and perform Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) including data cleaning, univariate and bivariate analysis.
Learn to create basic and advanced charts, graphs, and interactive dashboards in Tableau for storytelling with data.

modules.module_title: Data Analysis and Visualization Using Power BI
modules.description: Getting started with Power BI, data acquisition, transformation, creating dynamic reports and dashboards, and publishing reports.
Covers fundamentals of probability, continuous and conditional probability, hypothesis testing, and core concepts in linear algebra for Machine Learning.
Learn simple linear regression, best-fit line, gradient descent for optimization, and multiple linear regression, including handling multicollinearity and categorical variables.
Learn model building and evaluation of univariate and multivariate logistic regression models for classification tasks.
Introduction to decision trees with hyperparameter tuning, and unsupervised clustering techniques like K-means and hierarchical clustering.
Introduction to ensemble methods like Bagging, Random Forest, and Boosting for stronger model performance, and Principal Component Analysis (PCA) for dimensionality reduction.

modules.module_title: Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Neural Networks
modules.description: Learn NLP basics like regular expressions, lexical processing (tokenization, stemming), bag-of-words with TF-IDF, and fundamentals of Neural Networks and Deep Learning.
